title: Breaking: Sen. Graham Announces New Pro-Life Nationwide Bill
itunes:title: Breaking: Sen. Graham Announces New Pro-Life Nationwide Bill
description: Senator Lindsey Graham (SC) just introduced a bill in the Senate that would ban abortions after 15 weeks of pregnancy. Jay, Jordan, and the Sekulow team discuss this development as well as the DOJ's reportedly subpoenaing of 40 plus Trump associates. This and more today on Sekulow.
